widget.assistantSubtitle: Here to help with your application
widget.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm your Ontario Works assistant. I can help you fill out forms, explain terminology, and navigate the application. What can I help you with?
widget.contextualWelcome: Hi! I see you're on the {{title}} section. {{description}}. I can help explain any questions or terms here. What would you like to know?

fallbackResponses.one: I'm not sure about that specific question, but I can help you navigate the form or explain any terminology. Would you like me to explain a specific term?
fallbackResponses.two: I don't have information about that in my knowledge base. However, I can help with questions about Ontario Works eligibility, the application process, or explain any confusing terms.
fallbackResponses.three: That's outside my area of expertise. For specific questions about your case, I recommend contacting your local Ontario Works office. Is there anything about the application form I can help with?
